mapper.select: SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_MEMBERS , A.USER_ID , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP A WHERE A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.GROUP_ID

SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_MEMBERS , A.USER_ID , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{ ownerId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.GROUP_ID

SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_MEMBERS , A.USER_ID , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP A JOIN STUDY_GROUP_MEMBER B ON A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID WHERE B.USER_ID = #{ participantId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND B.MEMBER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.GROUP_ID

SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_MEMBERS , A.USER_ID , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP A WHERE A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID = #{ categoryId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.GROUP_ID
SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_MEMBERS , A.USER_ID , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP A WHERE A.GROUP_ID = #{ groupId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.ACTIVE_STATUS , A.GROUP_MEMBERS , A.USER_ID , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID FROM STUDY_GROUP A WHERE A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND A.GROUP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ groupName }, '%')

SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NAME , A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID , B.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_NAME , C.MEMBER_ID , C.MEMBER_ENROLLED_AT , C.GROUP_ROLE FROM STUDY_GROUP A JOIN STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY B ON A.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID = B.STUDY_GROUP_CATEGORY_ID JOIN STUDY_GROUP_MEMBER C ON A.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID WHERE C.USER_ID = #{ userId } AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND C.MEMBER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.GROUP_ID
